Zcss

by Znounce
Getting Started

Use this CDN link for both CSS and JS

https://gl.githack.com/znounce/zcss/raw/master/public/zcss.css &
https://gl.githack.com/znounce/zcss/raw/master/public/zcss.js

The CDN will include all components, which is not what I intended for the final one. But at the being I think its okay. The idea was, I can customize what components I want based on my website requirements. And makes each components easy to understand and memorise using the simple pattern class name for CSS. Also I want to include modifier to modified the default components.

For the components there is default style. take Button for example. Then we can customize the default one using modifier class name. For example button with class name btn & btn--danger or btn & btn--dangerOutline. btn--{modifierName}. Got it ?

There will be Base folder, Abstract folder & Components folder. Base folder will include all the basics stuff for example body, typography, fonts, grid etc. And for the Abstract it will include some utility, function, mixin & variable to compile the Scss code.

Do you really read what I wrote ??.

Base Components

This base components will include Typography, Grid, & Breakpoint. Yea, this is the foundation for Zcss
